item.description: In this meeting we'll exchange ideas on different Forex daytrading strategies. We'll also show you BTR's Managed Forex Account Strategy and speak with BTR's CEO and world-renowned Forex trader, Mr. Devrim Akyil. We'll order pizza & refreshments as well. Hope to see you all there!
item.how_to_find_us: I will meet members at the downstairs lobby

group.name: Boston Traders Meetup to Teach/Learn Trading Strategies

item.name: BTR FOREX MEETUP
